verses.text: FAI fakafeta‘i kia Sihova; he ‘oku lelei ia: He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.
Fai fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otua ‘o e ngaahi ‘otua: He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.
Fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Eiki ‘o e ngaahi ‘eiki: He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.
Kiate ia tofu pē taha ‘oku fai ‘a e ngaahi fu‘u me‘a fakaofo: He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.
Kiate ia ne ne ngaohi ‘a e langi ‘i he‘ene poto: He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.
Kiate ia na‘a ne folahi ‘a e fonua ‘i he funga vai: He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.
Kiate ia na‘a ne ngaohi maama lalahi; He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa;
Ko e la‘ā ke pule ki he ‘aho: He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa:
Ko e māhina mo e fetu‘u ke pule ki he pō: He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.
Kiate ia na‘a ne taa‘i ‘a ‘Isipite ‘i he‘enau ‘olopo‘ou tangata He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.
‘O ne ‘omi ‘a ‘Isileli mei honau lotolotonga: He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.
‘Aki ha nima mālohi, mo ha nima kuo hiki tā: He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.
Kiate ia na‘a ne tofi ke kongokonga ‘a e Tahi Kulokula: He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa:
‘O ne fakahā‘ele atu ‘a ‘Isileli ‘i hono vaeua; He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.
Ka ne tupe‘i ‘a Felo mo ‘ene hōsitē ‘i Tahi Kulokula: He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.
Kiate ia na‘a ne a‘utaki hono kakai ‘i he Toafa: He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.
Kiate ia na‘a ne taa‘i tu‘i mā‘olunga: He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa:
Mo have‘i tu‘i kaukaua: He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.
Ko Sīhoni ko e Tu‘i ‘Āmoli: He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.
Mo ‘Oki ko e Tu‘i Pēsani; He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.
‘O ne foaki hona fonua ko e tofi‘a: He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa:
Ko e tofi‘a mo‘o ‘Isileli ko e tamaio‘eiki ‘a‘ana; He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.
‘a e ‘Afio na‘a ne manatua kitautolu ‘i he‘etau vaivai: He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.
‘O ne veteange mei hotau kau fakamamahi; He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.
‘A ia ‘oku ne ‘ange me‘akai ki he kakano kotoa: He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.
‘Ē, mou fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otua ‘o langi na: He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.
